We are using Git for version control on this project.  

== Source Code Browser ==

To browse the source code:

http://github.com/mtrier/django-sqlalchemy/tree/master

== Git ==

Clone our Git repository:

{{{
git clone git://github.com/mtrier/django-sqlalchemy.git
}}}

Download a tarball of the master branch:

http://github.com/mtrier/django-sqlalchemy/tarball/master
